name: bccld
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cbc, c1), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz))

comment: A binomial coefficient, in its extended domain, is a nonnegative integer. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
